document_data.mainbody:
ndrath Dragonarl was a patriotic Knight of Cormyr active circa 430 DR.
Even though little of Andraths life was recorded in the annals of history, he was remembered for the A Call to Arms pamphlets found pinned to trees in Cormyr in the . Knight Dragonarl called his fellow able-bodied Cormyreans to pick up iron and shield in defense of their homes. The pamphlet called all willing men to be assembled by the old oak. Andrath Dragonarl and all those willing to join his cause were well aware of the death that awaited them. Nevertheless, they joined together as one Cormyr in spite of the kingdoms dark days.
